content: I'm interested in Vox and The Female Persuasion. Both books seem to explore the complexities of power dynamics and identity in a thought-provoking way. I've also been meaning to read more books by authors of color, so could you recommend some authors or books that explore similar themes? Additionally, I recently attended a book reading event at my local library where author Sarah Taylor discussed her latest novel, "The Lost City", and I was impressed by her insights on character development.
